001// Copyright (c) Choreo contributors
002
003package choreo;
004
005import static edu.wpi.first.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
006import static edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Alert.AlertType.kError;
007
008import choreo.trajectory.DifferentialSample;
009import choreo.trajectory.EventMarker;
010import choreo.trajectory.SwerveSample;
011import choreo.trajectory.Trajectory;
012import choreo.trajectory.TrajectorySample;
013import choreo.util.ChoreoAlert;
014import choreo.util.ChoreoAlert.*;
015import com.google.gson.Gson;
016import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
017import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
018import com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException;
019import edu.wpi.first.hal.FRCNetComm.tResourceType;
020import edu.wpi.first.hal.HAL;
021import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation;
022import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Filesystem;
023import java.io.BufferedReader;
024import java.io.File;
025import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
026import java.io.FileReader;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.HashMap;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.Optional;
033import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
034
035/** Utilities to load and follow Choreo Trajectories */
036public final class Choreo {
037  private static final Gson GSON =
038      new GsonBuilder()
039          .registerTypeAdapter(EventMarker.class, new EventMarker.Deserializer())
040          .create();
041  private static final String TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION = ".traj";
042  private static final int TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION = 1;
043  private static final MultiAlert cantFindTrajectory =
044      ChoreoAlert.multiAlert(causes -> "Could not find trajectory files: " + causes, kError);
045  private static final MultiAlert cantParseTrajectory =
046      ChoreoAlert.multiAlert(causes -> "Could not parse trajectory files: " + causes, kError);
047
048  private static File CHOREO_DIR = new File(Filesystem.getDeployDirectory(), "choreo");
049
050  /** This should only be used for unit testing. */
051  static void setChoreoDir(File choreoDir) {
052    CHOREO_DIR = choreoDir;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * This interface exists as a type alias. A TrajectoryLogger has a signature of ({@link
057   * Trajectory}, {@link Boolean})-&gt;void, where the function consumes a trajectory and a boolean
058   * indicating whether the trajectory is starting or finishing.
059   *
060   * @param <ST> {@link choreo.trajectory.DifferentialSample} or {@link
061   *     choreo.trajectory.SwerveSample}
062   */
063  public interface TrajectoryLogger<ST extends TrajectorySample<ST>>
064      extends BiConsumer<Trajectory<ST>, Boolean> {}
065
066  /** Default constructor. */
067  private Choreo() {
068    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("This is a utility class!");
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Load a trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files to be placed in
073   * src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
074   *
075   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
076   * @param trajectoryName The path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
077   *     directory, file extension is optional.
078   * @return The loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
079   */
080  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
081  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>>
082      Optional<Trajectory<SampleType>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName) {
083    requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "Choreo.loadTrajectory");
084
085    if (trajectoryName.endsWith(TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION)) {
086      trajectoryName =
087          trajectoryName.substring(0, trajectoryName.length() - TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION.length());
088    }
089    File trajectoryFile = new File(CHOREO_DIR, trajectoryName + TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION);
090    try {
091      var reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(trajectoryFile));
092      String str = reader.lines().reduce("", (a, b) -> a + b);
093      reader.close();
094      Trajectory<SampleType> trajectory = (Trajectory<SampleType>) loadTrajectoryString(str);
095      return Optional.of(trajectory);
096    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
097      cantFindTrajectory.addCause(trajectoryFile.toString());
098    } catch (JsonSyntaxException ex) {
099      cantParseTrajectory.addCause(trajectoryFile.toString());
100    } catch (Exception ex) {
101      ChoreoAlert.alert(
102              "Unknown error when parsing " + trajectoryFile + "; check console for more details",
103              kError)
104          .set(true);
105      DriverStation.reportError(ex.getMessage(), ex.getStackTrace());
106    }
107    return Optional.empty();
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Fetches the names of all available trajectories in the deploy directory.
112   *
113   * @return A list of all available trajectory names.
114   */
115  public static String[] availableTrajectories() {
116    List<String> trajectories = new ArrayList<>();
117    File[] files = CHOREO_DIR.listFiles();
118    if (files != null) {
119      for (File file : files) {
120        if (file.getName().endsWith(TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION)) {
121          trajectories.add(
122              file.getName()
123                  .substring(0, file.getName().length() - TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION.length()));
124        }
125      }
126    }
127    return trajectories.toArray(new String[0]);
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Load a trajectory from a string.
132   *
133   * @param trajectoryJsonString The JSON string.
134   * @return The loaded trajectory, or `empty std::optional` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
135   */
136  static Trajectory<? extends TrajectorySample<?>> loadTrajectoryString(
137      String trajectoryJsonString) {
138    JsonObject wholeTrajectory = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryJsonString, JsonObject.class);
139    String name = wholeTrajectory.get("name").getAsString();
140    int version;
141    try {
142      version = wholeTrajectory.get("version").getAsInt();
143      if (version != TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION) {
144        throw new RuntimeException(
145            name + ".traj: Wrong version: " + version + ". Expected " + TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION);
146      }
147    } catch (ClassCastException e) {
148      throw new RuntimeException(
149          name
150              + ".traj: Wrong version: "
151              + wholeTrajectory.get("version").getAsString()
152              + ". Expected "
153              + TRAJ_SCHEMA_VERSION);
154    }
155    // Filter out markers with negative timestamps or empty names
156    List<EventMarker> unfilteredEvents =
157        new ArrayList<EventMarker>(
158            Arrays.asList(GSON.fromJson(wholeTrajectory.get("events"), EventMarker[].class)));
159    unfilteredEvents.removeIf(marker -> marker.timestamp < 0 || marker.event.length() == 0);
160    EventMarker[] events = new EventMarker[unfilteredEvents.size()];
161    unfilteredEvents.toArray(events);
162
163    JsonObject trajectoryObj = wholeTrajectory.getAsJsonObject("trajectory");
164    Integer[] splits = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("splits"), Integer[].class);
165    if (splits.length == 0 || splits[0] != 0) {
166      Integer[] newArray = new Integer[splits.length + 1];
167      newArray[0] = 0;
168      System.arraycopy(splits, 0, newArray, 1, splits.length);
169      splits = newArray;
170    }
171    String sampleType = trajectoryObj.get("sampleType").getAsString();
172    if (sampleType.equals("Swerve")) {
173      HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_ChoreoTrajectory, 1);
174
175      SwerveSample[] samples = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("samples"), SwerveSample[].class);
176      return new Trajectory<SwerveSample>(name, List.of(samples), List.of(splits), List.of(events));
177    } else if (sampleType.equals("Differential")) {
178      HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_ChoreoTrajectory, 2);
179
180      DifferentialSample[] sampleArray =
181          GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("samples"), DifferentialSample[].class);
182      return new Trajectory<DifferentialSample>(
183          name, List.of(sampleArray), List.of(splits), List.of(events));
184    } else {
185      throw new RuntimeException("Unknown drive type: " + sampleType);
186    }
187  }
188
189  /**
190   * A utility for caching loaded trajectories. This allows for loading trajectories only once, and
191   * then reusing them.
192   */
193  public static class TrajectoryCache {
194    private final Map<String, Trajectory<?>> cache;
195
196    /** Creates a new TrajectoryCache with a normal {@link HashMap} as the cache. */
197    public TrajectoryCache() {
198      cache = new HashMap<>();
199    }
200
201    /**
202     * Creates a new TrajectoryCache with a custom cache.
203     *
204     * <p>this could be useful if you want to use a concurrent map or a map with a maximum size.
205     *
206     * @param cache The cache to use.
207     */
208    public TrajectoryCache(Map<String, Trajectory<?>> cache) {
209      requireNonNullParam(cache, "cache", "TrajectoryCache.<init>");
210      this.cache = cache;
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * Load a trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files to be placed in
215     * src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
216     *
217     * <p>This method will cache the loaded trajectory and reused it if it is requested again.
218     *
219     * @param trajectoryName the path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
220     *     directory, file extension is optional.
221     * @return the loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
222     * @see Choreo#loadTrajectory(String)
223     */
224    public Optional<? extends Trajectory<?>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName) {
225      requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "TrajectoryCache.loadTrajectory");
226      if (cache.containsKey(trajectoryName)) {
227        return Optional.of(cache.get(trajectoryName));
228      } else {
229        return Choreo.loadTrajectory(trajectoryName)
230            .map(
231                trajectory -> {
232                  cache.put(trajectoryName, trajectory);
233                  return trajectory;
234                });
235      }
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * Load a section of a split trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files
240     * to be placed in src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
241     *
242     * <p>This method will cache the loaded trajectory and reused it if it is requested again. The
243     * trajectory that is split off of will also be cached.
244     *
245     * @param trajectoryName the path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
246     *     directory, file extension is optional.
247     * @param splitIndex the index of the split trajectory to load
248     * @return the loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
249     * @see Choreo#loadTrajectory(String)
250     */
251    public Optional<? extends Trajectory<?>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName, int splitIndex) {
252      requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "TrajectoryCache.loadTrajectory");
253      // make the key something that could never possibly be a valid trajectory name
254      String key = trajectoryName + ".:." + splitIndex;
255      if (cache.containsKey(key)) {
256        return Optional.of(cache.get(key));
257      } else if (cache.containsKey(trajectoryName)) {
258        return cache
259            .get(trajectoryName)
260            .getSplit(splitIndex)
261            .map(
262                trajectory -> {
263                  cache.put(key, trajectory);
264                  return trajectory;
265                });
266      } else {
267        return Choreo.loadTrajectory(trajectoryName)
268            .flatMap(
269                trajectory -> {
270                  cache.put(trajectoryName, trajectory);
271                  return trajectory
272                      .getSplit(splitIndex)
273                      .map(
274                          split -> {
275                            cache.put(key, split);
276                            return split;
277                          });
278                });
279      }
280    }
281
282    /** Clear the cache. */
283    public void clear() {
284      cache.clear();
285    }
286  }
287}
